column5: Hey Guys  Headed up with my friend for some pike fishing in Temagami on a small pike lake. We fished this lake in the summer and caught a good number of pike so decided to give a try on the hardwater. We setup our tipups in shallow weedy water about 6-10 ft deep and waited. Not 10 mins go by and the first flag goes up! We handline a nice chunky pike. Through out the day we were catching good sized pike and they were biting like crazy. We landed about 7 pike all around the same size and we were pretty satisfied with our day of fishing. We were getting ready to pack up when...      The Flag goes up, I run over and see the fish burning off line, I grab the line and set the hook, and it was like setting the hook on a freight train! Immediately I know its a good fish! Now I am not the best at handlining so it was a very long and nervous process to bring the fish up to the hole to take a look at it. Then finally when I got the fish close to the hole we realize its a MONSTER! The fish takes off again and all I can do is let the line burn through my hand! After a while I get the gator up to the hole but his head is not fiting through the hole! So i roll up my sleeves and reach in under the ice to guide his head through the tiny hole, I get it through as my friend watches in disbelief as I pull out the gator that seems never ending, I am 6 ft 2 inches tall so use that to get an idea! We grab a quick pictures and back she goes, and we decided to call it a day since we will not be topping that anytime soon! Amazing day on the water and a Personal Best Pike for me!
Hey great fish, isn't Pikin on the hardstuff awesome. Had a monster from Nip a few yrs back that wouldn't fit thru a 10" hole no matter what angle we tried. Good for you. Nice on the release too.
Incredible! Did you put a tape on her? Beauty fish regardless...
Great report and pics Minnow Awesome..... look at the size of this gator    Congratulations on your PB  Thanks for sharing Leechman
that's a pig for sure, must have had a few gut wrenching moments coaxing that through the hole
Some beautiful fish there Minnow. Congrats to you and your Bud.
very nice can't wait to get up that way and fish for a few days
Nice effort and great report! Thanks. Jim
looks like a real nice 10-12 lber.solid.probably bigger in that lake
Nice looking pike for sure! Bet your hearts still pounding! Congrats on the pb, minnow.
Wow really???  i was thinking like close to 20lbs man i better stick the the scales rather then guessing.  Great report and an awesome pike through the ice!  Cheers!
Some nice fish there for sure Minnow !!!! Great stuff !
what you don't recognize that spot...LOL
Those pike are perfect eater size.  Big bones and easy for the kids to pick out... if ya don't filet 'em away already.  Good last fish too, fo' sho'.
